data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
In the minute 2, PSG have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
PSG are whistled for offside.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux push forward at Parc des Princes and Hatem Ben Arfa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined PSG defence.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Corner awarded to PSG.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
In the minute 10, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Own goal! Timothee Pembele has scored at the wrong end to make it 0-1.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for PSG close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, PSG's Alessandro Florenzi gets in a shot on goal at Parc des Princes. But the effort is unsuccessful.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
PSG's Mitchel Bakker is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Jeremie Pignard signals a PSG throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Important block from the Bordeaux defence as Kylian Mbappe fires in a strike for PSG.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 18, Bordeaux to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
Jeremie Pignard signals a throw-in for Bordeaux, close to PSG's area.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Bordeaux have a dangerous throw-in.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kylian Mbappe of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 20, Jeremie Pignard awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 26, PSG have been given a penalty at Parc des Princes...
Bordeaux's Otavio has been booked in Paris.
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Neymar.
In the minute 28, PSG pushes forward through Neymar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Moise Kean puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 34, Kylian Mbappe of PSG smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to PSG.
Kylian Mbappe hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for PSG!
In the minute 35, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Parc des Princes.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of PSG.
In the minute 36, Bordeaux drives forward and Mehdi Zerkane gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 40, PSG have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
PSG to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Jeremie Pignard signals a PSG throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 43, Rafinha of PSG smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
In the minute 45, Bordeaux's Toma Basic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first half has been concluded at Parc des Princes.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Loris Benito is replacing Enock Kwateng for the away team.
Bordeaux are coming forward and Hwang Ui-Jo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
PSG have a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Jeremie Pignard awards PSG a goal kick.
PSG's Kylian Mbappe has run offside.
Throw-in for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Bordeaux's Hwang Ui-Jo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a PSG defender.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Bordeaux's Hatem Ben Arfa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
In Paris PSG's Kylian Mbappe is caught offside.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 53, PSG are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Neymar (PSG) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 55, In Paris, Josh Maja of Bordeaux is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 58, PSG have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Bordeaux are pushing forward but Hwang Ui-Jo's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for PSG at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 58, Remi Oudin is replacing Mehdi Zerkane for Bordeaux at Parc des Princes.
Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's third substitution at Parc des Princes with Yacine Adli replacing Toma Basic.
The away team have replaced Hwang Ui-Jo with Nicolas De Preville. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jean-Louis Gasset.
In the minute 60, Goal! Bordeaux go level at 2-2 through Yacine Adli in Paris.
That's a fine assist from Hatem Ben Arfa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Rafinha with Angel Di Maria.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of PSG.
Thomas Tuchel (PSG) is making a second substitution, with Ander Herrera replacing Marco Verratti.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
In the minute 66, Bordeaux's Remi Oudin misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bordeaux's Nicolas De Preville breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
PSG have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to PSG.
PSG are pushing forward but Moise Kean's finish is wide of the goal.
Jeremie Pignard awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Remi Oudin (Bordeaux) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bordeaux's Remi Oudin is whistled for offside at Parc des Princes.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 73, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
In Paris Bordeaux attack through Nicolas De Preville. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
In the minute 76, In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
PSG pushes forward through Neymar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Paris.
In the minute 79, Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
PSG make their third substitution with Pablo Sarabia replacing Moise Kean.
In the minute 81, Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a fifth substitution, with Jimmy Briand replacing Josh Maja.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, PSG have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
PSG drive upfield and Neymar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 84, PSG have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Parc des Princes.
Mauro Icardi is on a sub for Leandro Paredes for PSG.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to PSG.
Bordeaux needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
Nicolas De Preville for Bordeaux drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, PSG are coming forward and Kylian Mbappe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this throw-in deep inside PSG's half?
In the minute 89, Hatem Ben Arfa of Bordeaux gets in a strike, but is off target.
PSG have a goal kick.
At Parc des Princes the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
PSG drives forward and Pablo Sarabia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Bordeaux.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
